name: boston, in pen and paper diptych print
description:
AS SEEN IN APARTMENT THERAPY, BOSTON!

the original is still available but a print is just as nice! two panel drawing revealing the city of boston, in pen and paper, PRINT

i just love how the charles river flows through the two pieces connecting the images to form one piece! both panels are sold together as a set.

each panel is 11" length x 14" height and are easily framed, (framing not included)
thin vertical lines of 0.25 mm black ink on heavy weight white paper, this is a high quality print of the original! each print is hand signed.

if two different prints of the same size are bought, i can offer free shipping on the second item! i will refund the second shipping cost after the order is placed.

name: paris, in pen and paper print
description:
the subtle texture and depth of a repeated vertical line reveals the individual fingerprint of the city of paris in the most simplistic form, in pen and paper.

i absolutely adore this piece!! it is even more beautiful in person than any camera can capture. (use the zoom feature located under the main image) this is a high quality print of the original.

approximately 30" length x 22" height, printed on 36 lb. white matte paper
each print is hand signed

name: dc, in pen and paper print
description:
hand drawing revealing the very orthogonal washington d.c., in pen and paper.

14" length x 11" height, easily framed, (framing not included)
thin vertical lines of 0.25 mm black ink on heavy weight white paper, this is a high quality PRINT of the original. each print is hand signed.

name: manhattan, in pen and paper print
description:
a repeated vertical line indicating the blocks of manhattan and celebrating the lines that define a neighborhood 

approximately 22" length x 30" height
high quality print on 36 lb. white matte paper
each print is hand signed
